text: Tomalokara majata yisakale nija straisakalara lagata yihara karae, sihamtara straisakala sihamtara maka hai nayaya, baram sihamtara maka kerala se'isakala tiraota yisakale sihamtaka janma diche; arau niscaya sihamte asangata arau asatya katha kaiche; niscaya allaha adhika papa mocanakarai arau bara ksamasila
